languages.text: "Наверное, пришло время поблагодарить тебя, {name}". {n}В голосе друкари разливается отравленный мед.{/n} "Наши маленькие игры... это прекрасное отвлечение от зова Сай'лантреш и стылой компании твоих соплеменников. Твоя... готовность на все позволила превратить этот корабль в дворец боли. Прелестно. Я не мог пожелать лучшего".

"Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."
languages.original_text: "Наверное, пришло время поблагодарить тебя, {name}". {n}В голосе друкари разливается отравленный мед.{/n} "Наши маленькие игры... это прекрасное отвлечение от зова Сай'лантреш и стылой компании твоих соплеменников. Твоя... готовность на все позволила превратить этот корабль в дворец боли. Прелестно. Я не мог пожелать лучшего".

Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

"Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

"Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

"Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

languages.text: “或许，我确实该向你道一声谢，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋的声音依旧滴着剧毒的蜜汁。{/n}“我们这场小小的游戏……让我无暇顾及赛·兰斯雷什的召唤，以及你那些同类的冷漠。你……不计一切代价，把这艘飞船变成了痛苦的殿堂。愉悦之至，我已经别无所求。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

traits.locale_text: “或许，我确实该向你道一声谢，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋的声音依旧滴着剧毒的蜜汁。{/n}“我们这场小小的游戏……让我无暇顾及赛·兰斯雷什的召唤，以及你那些同类的冷漠。你……不计一切代价，把这艘飞船变成了痛苦的殿堂。愉悦之至，我已经别无所求。”

languages.text: «Tal vez haya llegado la hora de darte las gracias, {name}». {n}Su voz meliflua destila veneno.{/n} «Nuestros jueguecitos... suponen una maravillosa distracción de la llamada de Sai'lanthresh y la gélida compañía de tu especie. Tu... disposición para hacer cualquier cosa ha convertido esta nave en un palacio del dolor. Es delicioso. No podría haber deseado nada más».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez haya llegado la hora de darte las gracias, {name}». {n}Su voz meliflua destila veneno.{/n} «Nuestros jueguecitos... suponen una maravillosa distracción de la llamada de Sai'lanthresh y la gélida compañía de tu especie. Tu... disposición para hacer cualquier cosa ha convertido esta nave en un palacio del dolor. Es delicioso. No podría haber deseado nada más».

languages.text: « Il est temps que je vous adresse des remerciements en bonne et due forme, {name}. »{n}Sa voix vous enveloppe comme du miel empoisonné.{/n} « Nos petits jeux... sont une superbe source de distraction. Ils parviennent à me faire oublier l'appel de Sai'lanthresh et mon infortunée présence parmi les mon-keigh. Votre... enthousiasme nous a permis de transformer ce vaisseau en un palais de souffrance. Un véritable chef-d'œuvre. Je n'aurais pas pu rêver mieux. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

traits.locale_text: « Il est temps que je vous adresse des remerciements en bonne et due forme, {name}. »{n}Sa voix vous enveloppe comme du miel empoisonné.{/n} « Nos petits jeux... sont une superbe source de distraction. Ils parviennent à me faire oublier l'appel de Sai'lanthresh et mon infortunée présence parmi les mon-keigh. Votre... enthousiasme nous a permis de transformer ce vaisseau en un palais de souffrance. Un véritable chef-d'œuvre. Je n'aurais pas pu rêver mieux. »

languages.text: "Vielleicht ist es an der Zeit, Euch zu danken, {name}." {n}Seine Stimme trieft nur so vor vergiftetem Honig.{/n} "Unsere kleinen Spiele ... dienen mir als wunderbare Ablenkung vom Ruf von Sai'lanthresh und der kalten Gesellschaft Eurer Art. Eure ... Bereitschaft, alles zu tun, was nötig ist, hat dieses Schiff zu einem Palast des Schmerzes gemacht. Sehr angenehm. Ich hätte mir nicht mehr wünschen können."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

traits.locale_text: Vielleicht ist es an der Zeit, Euch zu danken, {name}." {n}Seine Stimme trieft nur so vor vergiftetem Honig.{/n} "Unsere kleinen Spiele ... dienen mir als wunderbare Ablenkung vom Ruf von Sai'lanthresh und der kalten Gesellschaft Eurer Art. Eure ... Bereitschaft, alles zu tun, was nötig ist, hat dieses Schiff zu einem Palast des Schmerzes gemacht. Sehr angenehm. Ich hätte mir nicht mehr wünschen können."

languages.text: 「おそらく、お前に感謝すべき時が来たのだろうな、{name}」{n}毒入りの蜂蜜のごとき響きが声ににじむ。{/n}「俺たちのささやかな遊びは…セランスレッシュの呼び声と、お前の冷淡な仲間たちからの素晴らしい気晴らしだった。お前の…何でもするという意志は、この船を苦痛の宮殿へと変えたのさ。素晴らしい。これ以上望むことはないよ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく、お前に感謝すべき時が来たのだろうな、{name}」{n}毒入りの蜂蜜のごとき響きが声ににじむ。{/n}「俺たちのささやかな遊びは…セランスレッシュの呼び声と、お前の冷淡な仲間たちからの素晴らしい気晴らしだった。お前の…何でもするという意志は、この船を苦痛の宮殿へと変えたのさ。素晴らしい。これ以上望むことはないよ」

languages.original_text: "Perhaps the time has come to thank you, ." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

languages.text: "Belki de sana teşekkür etme vaktim gelmiştir {name}." {n}Sesinden âdeta zehirli bal damlıyor.{/n} "Küçük oyunlarımız... Sai'lanthresh'in çağrısına ve ırkının o buz gibi yoldaşlığına maruz kalmışken dikkatimi çok güzel dağıttı. Senin... Her şeyi yapmaya böylesine gönüllü olman, gemiyi bir acı sarayına dönüştürdü. Enfes. Bundan daha fazlasını isteyemezdim."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the time has come to thank you, {name}." {n}Poisoned honey oozes in his voice.{/n} "Our little games... are a wonderful distraction from the call of Sai'lanthresh and the frigid company of your kind. Your... willingness to do anything has turned this ship into a palace of pain. Delectable. I could not have wished for more."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de sana teşekkür etme vaktim gelmiştir {name}." {n}Sesinden âdeta zehirli bal damlıyor.{/n} "Küçük oyunlarımız... Sai'lanthresh'in çağrısına ve ırkının o buz gibi yoldaşlığına maruz kalmışken dikkatimi muhteşem dağıttı. Senin... Her şeyi yapmaya böylesine gönüllü olman, gemiyi bir acı sarayına dönüştürdü. Enfes. Bundan daha fazlasını isteyemezdim."
